name: The Forest Defender
description:
The version you can download here is the wrong one, this is the right one: https://www.mediafire.com/file/fyc0j8m6om4yxc9/The_Forest_Defender_Real_v0.12.ex...

You aren't going to win first try, lemme just get that out there. (it will take about 30 min)

The game is actually pretty deep when you get into it ;)

There is still a lot of unfinished stuff in it, but 75% of the core gameplay is done lol...

Everything is made by me, JonasMG :)

There is no win-screen but you have won when the enemies stop coming and you have defeatet the boss.. You can keep exploring a little more if you want to tho heheh
